scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n BACKEND,UI,SWAGGER -c blue,green,yellow "npm run dev --prefix coachqa-backend" "npm run dev --prefix coachqa-ui" "npm run dev --prefix coachqa-swagger-ui"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build --prefix coachqa-backend" "npm run build --prefix coachqa-ui" "npm run build --prefix coachqa-swagger-ui"
scripts.lint: concurrently "npm run lint --prefix coachqa-backend" "npm run lint --prefix coachqa-ui"
scripts.api-health: curl http://127.0.0.1:9002/api/health || echo Backend not running
